dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Violations
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 1:21 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Violations




-- 
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: Bob Brinkman <ceronomus@comcast.net>
To: abuse@theplanet.com, inquiries@tor.com, bfi@randomhouse.com
Date: Monday, February 14, 2005, 9:19:54 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Violations

===8<==============Original message text===============
To whom it may concern,
For some time now Linda Antonsson of www.Westeros.org has been violating the
intellectual property rights of George R. R. Martin, Robert Jordan and other
authors, using their creations for her own purposes without permission from
the publishers or the authors.While she has given mere lip service to the
copyrights held, all materials have been used without permission and, as
such, are in violation of US Copyright Laws and International Copyright
agreements.

Searching through this website turns up numerous copyright violations

http://www.westeros.org/Misc/AlterEgo/Angharad.html - Robert Jordan/Tor
Books
http://www.westeros.org/ - George R. R. Martin/Random House Publishing

I request that, in accordance to Copyright Laws, that this material be
removed immediately from your servers.

Bob Brinkman

===8<===========End of original message text===========
